name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hijinx - Icebreaker Games for Google Meet

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Team building activities for your remote workplace

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you work from home, it can be tricky to engage with your colleagues in a personal way. But if you donâ€™t take time to get some genuine human connection, itâ€™s just work, work, work all the time. And you risk your employees feeling like just another cog in a machine. Enter Hijinx.

Hijinx brings fun, safe-for-work games to your virtual meetings. And itâ€™s fully integrated with Google Meet. No more getting lost in tabs or sharing the wrong screen. Everyone in the meeting can play the game, or just watch, all within your meeting room.

Using a hybrid model? No problem! Hijinx works in companion mode too. 

Welcome new hires to your team, increase employee engagement, build trust, or add some laughter to your workday.
